channel.title: Digital Humanities on P H A N T I S O C R A C Y.
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Humanities on P H A N T I S O C R A C Y.

item.title: Digitial Humanities in Secondary Education: A Preview
item.description: Over the past year, I’ve grown increasingly attracted to the idea of teaching a digital humanities course in a secondary education environment. I have three reasons for this: Humanities-based education remains vitally important and must not fall by the wayside.
